TEXT.English: Hello there! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Associate yourself with men of good quality, [CT_NAME], if you esteem your own reputation. It is better be alone than in bad company.
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, [CT_NAME] ! Je ne peux pas mentir : ça me fait plaisir de vous rencontrer !
TEXT.German: Willkommen, [CT_NAME]! Ich kann es nicht leugnen: Ich bin mehr als erfreut, Euch kennen zu lernen!
TEXT.Italian: Ti do il benvenuto, [CT_NAME]! Non mentirò, sono incredibilmente contento di vederti!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Os doy la bienvenida, [CT_NAME]! No puedo mentiros, estoy encantadísimo de conoceros.

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], the leader of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. I have no other view than to promote the public good, and am unambitious of honours not founded in the approbation of my country.
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, [CT_NAME] ! Je ne peux pas mentir : ça me fait plaisir de vous rencontrer !
TEXT.German: Willkommen, [CT_NAME]! Ich kann es nicht leugnen: Ich bin mehr als erfreut, Euch kennen zu lernen!
TEXT.Italian: Ti do il benvenuto, [CT_NAME]! Non mentirò, sono incredibilmente contento di vederti!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Os doy la bienvenida, [CT_NAME]! No puedo mentiros, estoy encantadísimo de conoceros.

TEXT.English: Good to meet you, [CT_NAME]. I'm [OUR_NAME]. Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all. That's my advice. What do you say?
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, [CT_NAME] ! Je ne peux pas mentir : ça me fait plaisir de vous rencontrer !
TEXT.German: Willkommen, [CT_NAME]! Ich kann es nicht leugnen: Ich bin mehr als erfreut, Euch kennen zu lernen!
TEXT.Italian: Ti do il benvenuto, [CT_NAME]! Non mentirò, sono incredibilmente contento di vederti!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Os doy la bienvenida, [CT_NAME]! No puedo mentiros, estoy encantadísimo de conoceros.

TEXT.English: [CT_NAME]. I know you have been told much evil of me; believe only what you see with your eyes, for those who speak ill of me are my enemies, and some were my vassals and have rebelled against me at your coming and said those things to gain favour with you. Please, let us have peace!
TEXT.French: C'est un plaisir de faire votre connaissance, [CT_NAME] ! Sacrifions tous deux cinq mille esclaves pour célébrer cette rencontre de bon augure.
TEXT.German: Ich freue mich, Euch kennen zu lernen, [CT_NAME]! Lasst uns zur Feier dieses denkwürdigen Augenblicks je fünfzigtausend Sklaven opfern!
TEXT.Italian: Piacere di incontrarti, [CT_NAME]! Per festeggiare questo momento propizio, dovremmo massacrare cinquantamila schiavi ciascuno.
TEXT.Spanish: Me alegro mucho de conoceros, [CT_NAME]. Sacrifiquemos cada uno a cincuenta mil esclavos para celebrar esta propicia ocasión.

TEXT.English: Behold, my friend, the spring is come; the earth has gladly received the embrace of the sun, and we shall soon see the results of their love! I am [OUR_NAME], Great Chief of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I greet you in peace.
TEXT.French: Les puissants [OUR_CIV_ADJ:3] vous souhaitent la bienvenue, [CT_NAME]. Serait-il politiquement correct de vous offrir un calumet de la paix ?
TEXT.German: Das großartige [OUR_CIV_ADJ:3] Volk heißt Euch willkommen, [CT_NAME]. Wäre es politisch korrekt, Euch die Friedenspfeife anzubieten?
TEXT.Italian: Il grande popolo [OUR_CIV_ADJ] ti dà il benvenuto, [CT_NAME]. è politicamente corretto offrirti un calumet della pace?
TEXT.Spanish: El gran pueblo [OUR_CIV_ADJ:1] os da la bienvenida, [CT_NAME]. ¿Sería apropiado ofreceros una pipa de la paz u os habéis sumado a la cruzada contra el tabaco?

TEXT.English: Greetings, stranger. I am [OUR_NAME]. I am here by the will of the God, and by His will I am chief. Are our peoples to fight or to trade?
TEXT.French: Les puissants [OUR_CIV_ADJ:3] vous souhaitent la bienvenue, [CT_NAME]. Serait-il politiquement correct de vous offrir un calumet de la paix ?
TEXT.German: Das großartige [OUR_CIV_ADJ:3] Volk heißt Euch willkommen, [CT_NAME]. Wäre es politisch korrekt, Euch die Friedenspfeife anzubieten?
TEXT.Italian: Il grande popolo [OUR_CIV_ADJ] ti dà il benvenuto, [CT_NAME]. è politicamente corretto offrirti un calumet della pace?
TEXT.Spanish: El gran pueblo [OUR_CIV_ADJ:1] os da la bienvenida, [CT_NAME]. ¿Sería apropiado ofreceros una pipa de la paz u os habéis sumado a la cruzada contra el tabaco?

TEXT.English: Hello, friend. My name is [OUR_NAME], but you can call me Henry. Just don't call me late for dinner.
TEXT.French: Bonjour, mon ami. Je m'appelle [OUR_NAME], mais vous pouvez m'appeler Henry. Evitez simplement de m'appeler trop tard pour dîner.
TEXT.German: Hallo. Ich bin [OUR_NAME], aber Ihr könnt mich Henry nennen. Hauptsache Ihr nennt meinen Namen im Zusammenhang mit einer Einladung zum Essen.
TEXT.Italian: Salve, amico. Il mio nome è [OUR_NAME], ma puoi chiamarmi Henry. Basta che non mi chiami troppo tardi per la cena.
TEXT.Spanish: Hola, amigo. Soy [OUR_NAME], pero podéis llamarme Henry. Pero no me llaméis tarde para la cena.

TEXT.English: Hello, friend. My name is [OUR_NAME], but you can call me Martim. Just don't call me late for dinner.
TEXT.French: Bonjour, mon ami. Je m'appelle [OUR_NAME], mais vous pouvez m'appeler Martim. Evitez simplement de m'appeler trop tard pour dîner.
TEXT.German: Hallo. Ich bin [OUR_NAME], aber Ihr könnt mich Martim nennen. Hauptsache Ihr nennt meinen Namen im Zusammenhang mit einer Einladung zum Essen.
TEXT.Italian: Salve, amico. Il mio nome è [OUR_NAME], ma puoi chiamarmi Martim. Basta che non mi chiami troppo tardi per la cena.
TEXT.Spanish: Hola, amigo. Soy [OUR_NAME], pero podéis llamarme Martim. Pero no me llaméis tarde para la cena.

TEXT.English: I am honored to meet the great [CT_NAME]! How can the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] help you this day?
TEXT.French: C'est un honneur de rencontrer le grand [CT_NAME]! Que peuvent faire les [OUR_CIV_ADJ:3] pour vous, aujourd'hui ?
TEXT.German: Ich fühle mich geehrt, das große Staatsoberhaupt [CT_NAME] kennenlernen zu dürfen! Wie kann das [OUR_CIV_ADJ:3] Volk Euch heute helfen?
TEXT.Italian: Sono onorato di incontrarti, grande [CT_NAME]! Come può aiutarti, oggi, la civiltà [OUR_CIV_ADJ] ?
TEXT.Spanish: Es un honor conocer al gran [CT_NAME]. ¿En qué pueden ayudaros hoy los [OUR_CIV_ADJ:3]?

TEXT.English: I salute you! I am [OUR_NAME] of the mighty [OUR_EMPIRE]. may peace be with you...
TEXT.French: Je vous salue ! Je suis [OUR_NAME] du puissant [OUR_EMPIRE]. Que la paix soit avec vous...
TEXT.German: Seid gegrüßt! Ich bin [OUR_NAME], Staatsoberhaupt des [OUR_EMPIRE:3]es. Ich hoffe, unsere großartigen Völker werden in Frieden zusammenleben.
TEXT.Italian: Saluti! Io sono [OUR_NAME] dell'[OUR_EMPIRE]. Spero che i nostri due grandi popoli possano vivere in pace.
TEXT.Spanish: Saludos. ¡Soy [OUR_NAME], del [OUR_EMPIRE]! Espero que nuestros dos grandes pueblos puedan vivir en paz.

TEXT.English: Halla [CT_NAME]! Fear less, hope more; whine less, breathe more; talk less, say more; hate less, love more; and all good things are yours.
TEXT.French: Halla [CT_NAME]! Fear less, hope more; whine less, breathe more; talk less, say more; hate less, love more; and all good things are yours.
TEXT.German: Halla [CT_NAME]! Fear less, hope more; whine less, breathe more; talk less, say more; hate less, love more; and all good things are yours.
TEXT.Italian: Halla [CT_NAME]! Fear less, hope more; whine less, breathe more; talk less, say more; hate less, love more; and all good things are yours.
TEXT.Spanish: Halla [CT_NAME]! Fear less, hope more; whine less, breathe more; talk less, say more; hate less, love more; and all good things are yours.

TEXT.English: You are the child of avarice, the brother of iniquity, and the father of mischief! Now get out!
TEXT.French: Nous n'écouterons pas vos mensonges insidieux. Hors d'ici !
TEXT.German: Wir werden uns Eure infamen Lügen nicht anhören! Hinfort!
TEXT.Italian: Non ascolteremo le tue menzogne. Vattene!
TEXT.Spanish: No escucharemos vuestras mentiras insidiosas. ¡Fuera de aquí!

TEXT.English: It is not necessary for eagles to be crows.
TEXT.French: Je ne parle pas aux menteurs. Maintenant, filez !
TEXT.German: Ich gebe mich nicht mit Lügnern ab! Und jetzt verschwindet!
TEXT.Italian: Non parlo coi bugiardi. Ora sgomma.
TEXT.Spanish: No hablo con gente embustera. Y ahora, largo de aquí.

TEXT.English: I will now use my cunning knowledge of tactics to ignore you.
TEXT.French: Je vais maintenant vous démontrer mes talents de stratège en vous ignorant totalement.
TEXT.German: Ich werde jetzt mein überragendes taktisches Wissen verwenden und Euch ignorieren.
TEXT.Italian: Ora userò la mia incredibile conoscenza della tattica per ignorarti.
TEXT.Spanish: Ahora utilizaré mi astuto conocimiento de la táctica para hacer caso omiso de vos.

TEXT.English: I will now use my cunning knowledge of tactics to ignore you.
TEXT.French: Je vais maintenant vous démontrer mes talents de stratège en vous ignorant totalement.
TEXT.German: Ich werde jetzt mein überragendes taktisches Wissen verwenden und Euch ignorieren.
TEXT.Italian: Ora userò la mia incredibile conoscenza della tattica per ignorarti.
TEXT.Spanish: Ahora utilizaré mi astuto conocimiento de la táctica para hacer caso omiso de vos.

TEXT.English: we are too busy to speak with you, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.French: Nous sommes trop occupes pour vous parler, [CT_NAME] !
TEXT.German: Euer bedeutungsloses Geschwafel amüsiert uns ganz und gar nicht, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Italian: I tuoi balbettii senza senso non sono affatto divertenti, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡No nos hace gracia vuestra cháchara absurda, [CT_NAME]!

TEXT.English: we are too busy to speak with you, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.French: Nous sommes trop occupes pour vous parler, [CT_NAME] !
TEXT.German: Euer bedeutungsloses Geschwafel amüsiert uns ganz und gar nicht, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Italian: I tuoi balbettii senza senso non sono affatto divertenti, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡No nos hace gracia vuestra cháchara absurda, [CT_NAME]!

TEXT.English: we are too busy to speak with you, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.French: Nous sommes trop occupes pour vous parler, [CT_NAME] !
TEXT.German: Euer bedeutungsloses Geschwafel amüsiert uns ganz und gar nicht, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Italian: I tuoi balbettii senza senso non sono affatto divertenti, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡No nos hace gracia vuestra cháchara absurda, [CT_NAME]!

TEXT.English: This is the time for determining whether the people of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] are to be free men or slaves. I say free men! That means not making deals with the likes of you.
TEXT.French: L'Amérique ne négocie pas avec les terroristes.
TEXT.German: Amerika verhandelt nicht mit Terroristen!
TEXT.Italian: L'America non negozia con i terroristi.
TEXT.Spanish: América no negocia con terroristas.

TEXT.English: Do the kings know the destiny of those they left behind, their posterity? If only they are watching! If only they can see what I see! This is a glorious war, it will not end!
TEXT.French: Non. Nous n'avons pas encore exterminé assez de guerriers des [CT_CIV_ADJ] pour étancher la soif de sang de nos dieux. Essayez plus tard.
TEXT.German: Nein! Wir haben noch nicht genug [CT_CIV_ADJ:3] Krieger geopfert, um die Götter zu besänftigen! Meldet Euch später noch mal!
TEXT.Italian: No, non abbiamo ancora sacrificato abbastanza guerrieri [CT_CIV_ADJ:3] per placare l'infinita sete di sangue degli dei. Prova più tardi.
TEXT.Spanish: No. Aún no hemos sacrificado bastantes guerreros [CT_CIV_ADJ:3] para aplacar la insaciable sed de sangre de los dioses. Intentadlo más tarde.

TEXT.English: If I agree to dispose of any part of our land to the [CT_CIV_ADJ] people, I would feel guilty of taking food away from our children's mouths. I do not wish to be that mean. The war must continue.
TEXT.French: Cette guerre prendra fin quand je le déciderai et pas avant.
TEXT.German: Dieser Krieg wird erst enden, wenn ich es sage, und nicht einen Augenblick früher!
TEXT.Italian: Questa guerra finirà quando io deciderò di farla finire, e non un secondo prima.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta guerra terminará cuando yo lo decida, y no antes.

TEXT.English: I knew you would beg for peace eventually, but there will be no peace until you surrender.
TEXT.French: Je savais que vous finiriez par me supplier de faire la paix, mais il n'y aura aucune paix avant votre capitulation.
TEXT.German: Ich wusste, dass Ihr irgendwann um Frieden betteln würdet, aber es wird erst Frieden geben, wenn Ihr Euch ergebt.
TEXT.Italian: Sapevo che mi avresti pregato di stipulare una pace, alla fine, ma non ci sarà pace fino alla tua resa.
TEXT.Spanish: Sabía que, tarde o temprano, suplicaríais la paz. Pero no habrá paz hasta que os rindáis.

TEXT.English: I knew you would beg for peace eventually, but there will be no peace until you surrender.
TEXT.French: Je savais que vous finiriez par me supplier de faire la paix, mais il n'y aura aucune paix avant votre capitulation.
TEXT.German: Ich wusste, dass Ihr irgendwann um Frieden betteln würdet, aber es wird erst Frieden geben, wenn Ihr Euch ergebt.
TEXT.Italian: Sapevo che mi avresti pregato di stipulare una pace, alla fine, ma non ci sarà pace fino alla tua resa.
TEXT.Spanish: Sabía que, tarde o temprano, suplicaríais la paz. Pero no habrá paz hasta que os rindáis.

TEXT.English: we won't accept peace with you, bad fellows. we gonna rip you off of the earth
TEXT.French: Nous n'accepterons la paix avec vous, mauvais gens. Nous allons vous balayer de la surface de la terre.
TEXT.German: Kriege sind eine höchst unangenehme Sache, manchmal aber auch unumgänglich. Und wie ich höre, ist das in diesem Fall so, deshalb muss ich Euer Anliegen zurückweisen. Diese Unterhaltung ist beendet!
TEXT.Italian: La guerra non è per niente piacevole, ma a volte è necessaria. Questa è una di quelle volte, perciò dobbiamo respingere le tue suppliche. L'udienza termina qui.
TEXT.Spanish: La guerra es harto desagradable, pero a veces resulta necesaria. Nos informan de que ésta es una de esas veces, así que debemos rechazar vuestras súplicas. La audiencia ha terminado.

TEXT.English: we won't accept peace with you, bad fellows. we gonna rip you off of the earth
TEXT.French: Nous n'accepterons la paix avec vous, mauvais gens. Nous allons vous balayer de la surface de la terre.
TEXT.German: Kriege sind eine höchst unangenehme Sache, manchmal aber auch unumgänglich. Und wie ich höre, ist das in diesem Fall so, deshalb muss ich Euer Anliegen zurückweisen. Diese Unterhaltung ist beendet!
TEXT.Italian: La guerra non è per niente piacevole, ma a volte è necessaria. Questa è una di quelle volte, perciò dobbiamo respingere le tue suppliche. L'udienza termina qui.
TEXT.Spanish: La guerra es harto desagradable, pero a veces resulta necesaria. Nos informan de que ésta es una de esas veces, así que debemos rechazar vuestras súplicas. La audiencia ha terminado.

TEXT.English: we won't accept peace with you, bad fellows. we gonna rip you off of the earth
TEXT.French: Nous n'accepterons la paix avec vous, mauvais gens. Nous allons vous balayer de la surface de la terre.
TEXT.German: Kriege sind eine höchst unangenehme Sache, manchmal aber auch unumgänglich. Und wie ich höre, ist das in diesem Fall so, deshalb muss ich Euer Anliegen zurückweisen. Diese Unterhaltung ist beendet!
TEXT.Italian: La guerra non è per niente piacevole, ma a volte è necessaria. Questa è una di quelle volte, perciò dobbiamo respingere le tue suppliche. L'udienza termina qui.
TEXT.Spanish: La guerra es harto desagradable, pero a veces resulta necesaria. Nos informan de que ésta es una de esas veces, así que debemos rechazar vuestras súplicas. La audiencia ha terminado.

TEXT.English: Be courteous to all, [CT_NAME], but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence! Now that I have given you mine, how may [OUR_CIV_SHORT] be of assistance?
TEXT.French: Mes hommages, [CT_NAME]. Avez-vous fait bon voyage depuis le pays des [CT_CIV_SHORT] ? J'y ai séjourné une fois, vous savez...
TEXT.German: Seid gegrüßt, [CT_NAME]. Hattet Ihr eine angenehme Reise? Wusstet Ihr, dass ich mal in [CT_CIV_SHORT] genächtigt habe?
TEXT.Italian: Salve, [CT_NAME]. Come è stato il tuo viaggio dalle terre [CT_CIV_SHORT:4]? Una volta ho dormito là.
TEXT.Spanish: Saludos, [CT_NAME]. ¿Qué tal vuestro viaje desde [CT_CIV_SHORT]? Una vez dormí allí, como ya sabéis.

TEXT.English: My friend, I know that you have been told that the walls of my houses are made of gold, and that other things in my household are likewise of gold. The houses, as you can see, are of stone and lime and clay, but as long as you are here, consider these houses your own.
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, [CT_NAME] ! Je vais massacrer mille esclaves pour célébrer votre visite !
TEXT.German: Willkommen, [CT_NAME]! Ich werde Euch zu Ehren zahlreiche Sklaven niedermetzeln lassen!
TEXT.Italian: Ti do il benvenuto, [CT_NAME]! Per onorare la tua visita, ucciderò un gran numero di schiavi!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Os saludamos, amigable [CT_NAME]! ¡Sacrificaré a un sinfín de esclavos para conmemorar vuestra visita!

TEXT.English: Welcome, my friend! Let us put our minds together and see what life we can make for our children.
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, mon ami ! Je vous félicite d'avoir eu la sagesse de chercher conseil auprès de civilisations plus évoluées.
TEXT.German: Willkommen! Ihr seid in der Tat gut beraten, Euch mit jenen, die Euch überlegen sind, gutzustellen.
TEXT.Italian: Benvenuto, amico mio! Sei davvero saggio a cercare consiglio presso chi è migliore di te.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Os saludamos, camarada! Tenéis sabiduría suficiente como para buscar consejo de vuestros superiores.

TEXT.English: Well met, friend. It is spring! Every seed is awakened, and all animal life. Tell me -- what can I do for you this day?
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, mon ami ! Je vous félicite d'avoir eu la sagesse de chercher conseil auprès de civilisations plus évoluées.
TEXT.German: Willkommen! Ihr seid in der Tat gut beraten, Euch mit jenen, die Euch überlegen sind, gutzustellen.
TEXT.Italian: Benvenuto, amico mio! Sei davvero saggio a cercare consiglio presso chi è migliore di te.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Os saludamos, camarada! Tenéis sabiduría suficiente como para buscar consejo de vuestros superiores.

TEXT.English: Finally I get to talk to a worthy adversary. What can the [OUR_EMPIRE] do for you?
TEXT.French: Enfin un adversaire à ma mesure ! Que peut faire l'[OUR_EMPIRE] pour vous ?
TEXT.German: Endlich kann ich mich mit einem würdigen Gegner unterhalten. Was kann das [OUR_EMPIRE:2] für Euch tun?
TEXT.Italian: Finalmente parlo con un degno avversario. Cosa può fare [OUR_EMPIRE] per te?
TEXT.Spanish: Por fin consigo hablar con un adversario digno. ¿Qué puede hacer el [OUR_EMPIRE] por vos?

TEXT.English: Finally I get to talk to a worthy adversary. What can the [OUR_EMPIRE] do for you?
TEXT.French: Enfin un adversaire à ma mesure ! Que peut faire l'[OUR_EMPIRE] pour vous ?
TEXT.German: Endlich kann ich mich mit einem würdigen Gegner unterhalten. Was kann das [OUR_EMPIRE:2] für Euch tun?
TEXT.Italian: Finalmente parlo con un degno avversario. Cosa può fare [OUR_EMPIRE] per te?
TEXT.Spanish: Por fin consigo hablar con un adversario digno. ¿Qué puede hacer el [OUR_EMPIRE] por vos?

TEXT.English: Let's have a talk together, after, you may stay for a last treaty, or more...
TEXT.French: Passons un peu de temps ensemble, apres vous pourrez rester pour un dernier traite, voir plus....
TEXT.German: Willkommen! Lasst uns unsere Streitwagen anspannen und unsere Feinde vernichten! Mögen die Gefallenen auf dem Schlachtfeld ein Festmahl für die Geier sein!
TEXT.Italian: Salve, ti do il benvenuto! Montiamo sulle bighe e distruggiamo i nemici, lasceremo sul campo di battaglia solamente i cadaveri perché se ne sfamino i corvi!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Os saludamos, camarada! Venga, montemos en los carros, destruyamos a nuestros enemigos y dejemos cincuenta mil cadáveres pudriéndose en el campo de batalla como pasto para los cuervos.

TEXT.English: Let's have a party together, after, you may stay for a last drink, or more...
TEXT.French: Passons un peu de temps ensemble, apres vous pourrez rester pour un dernier verre, voir plus....
TEXT.German: Willkommen! Lasst uns unsere Streitwagen anspannen und unsere Feinde vernichten! Mögen die Gefallenen auf dem Schlachtfeld ein Festmahl für die Geier sein!
TEXT.Italian: Salve, ti do il benvenuto! Montiamo sulle bighe e distruggiamo i nemici, lasceremo sul campo di battaglia solamente i cadaveri perché se ne sfamino i corvi!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Os saludamos, camarada! Venga, montemos en los carros, destruyamos a nuestros enemigos y dejemos cincuenta mil cadáveres pudriéndose en el campo de batalla como pasto para los cuervos.

TEXT.English: Let's have a party together, after, you may stay for a last drink, or more...
TEXT.French: Passons un peu de temps ensemble, apres vous pourrez rester pour un dernier verre, voir plus....
TEXT.German: Willkommen! Lasst uns unsere Streitwagen anspannen und unsere Feinde vernichten! Mögen die Gefallenen auf dem Schlachtfeld ein Festmahl für die Geier sein!
TEXT.Italian: Salve, ti do il benvenuto! Montiamo sulle bighe e distruggiamo i nemici, lasceremo sul campo di battaglia solamente i cadaveri perché se ne sfamino i corvi!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Os saludamos, camarada! Venga, montemos en los carros, destruyamos a nuestros enemigos y dejemos cincuenta mil cadáveres pudriéndose en el campo de batalla como pasto para los cuervos.

TEXT.English: Friendship is a plant of slow growth, and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to the appellation, [CT_NAME]. I do not consider you my friend.
TEXT.French: Qu'est ce qui pourrait bien intéresser les [OUR_CIV_SHORT] de la part des [CT_CIV_SHORT] ?
TEXT.German: Was könnte [CT_CIV_SHORT] dem Volk von [OUR_CIV_SHORT] wohl schon Interessantes mitzuteilen haben?
TEXT.Italian: Che cos'ha [CT_CIV_SHORT:2] da dire che possa interessare [OUR_CIV_SHORT:2]?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Y qué puede decir [CT_CIV_SHORT] que sea de interés para [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?

TEXT.English: There are things the [CT_CIV_ADJ] tell us that sound good to hear. But when they have accomplished their purpose they go home and do not try to fulfill their agreements with us. I will listen to you, but wearily.
TEXT.French: Que pourriez-vous dire qui soit du moindre intérêt pour moi ?
TEXT.German: Was könntet Ihr mir schon zu bieten haben?
TEXT.Italian: Cosa potresti mai dire di minimamente interessante per me?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Qué podéis decir que tenga siquiera el mínimo interés para mí?

TEXT.English: Each man is good in the sight of the God, [CT_NAME]. In my sight, however... I struggle when I see you.
TEXT.French: Que pourriez-vous dire qui soit du moindre intérêt pour moi ?
TEXT.German: Was könntet Ihr mir schon zu bieten haben?
TEXT.Italian: Cosa potresti mai dire di minimamente interessante per me?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Qué podéis decir que tenga siquiera el mínimo interés para mí?

TEXT.English: You lack the guile to trick me. Be warned I will not react well to deceit.
TEXT.French: Vous n'êtes pas assez rusé pour me duper. Soyez sûr que je réagirai très mal à toute trahison.
TEXT.German: Ihr seid nicht listig genug, um mich hereinzulegen. Ich warne Euch, ich reagiere nicht besonders erfreut auf Betrug.
TEXT.Italian: Non sei abbastanza furbo per fregarmi. Attento: non reagisco bene agli inganni.
TEXT.Spanish: Os falta astucia para engañarme. Os lo advierto: las triquiñuelas no son de mi agrado.

TEXT.English: You lack the guile to trick me. Be warned I will not react well to deceit.
TEXT.French: Vous n'êtes pas assez rusé pour me duper. Soyez sûr que je réagirai très mal à toute trahison.
TEXT.German: Ihr seid nicht listig genug, um mich hereinzulegen. Ich warne Euch, ich reagiere nicht besonders erfreut auf Betrug.
TEXT.Italian: Non sei abbastanza furbo per fregarmi. Attento: non reagisco bene agli inganni.
TEXT.Spanish: Os falta astucia para engañarme. Os lo advierto: las triquiñuelas no son de mi agrado.

TEXT.English: Hi, [CT_NAME]. I was told some minor leader wanted to speak us...
TEXT.French: Bonjour, [CT_NAME]. On m'a dit qu'un petit chef voulait nous parler...
TEXT.German: Guten Tag, [CT_NAME]. Was beschert mir diese unerwartete Störung?
TEXT.Italian: Buongiorno a te, [CT_NAME]. A cosa dobbiamo questa interruzione inaspettata?
TEXT.Spanish: Buenos días tengáis, [CT_NAME]. ¿A qué debemos esta interrupción tan inesperada?

TEXT.English: Hi, [CT_NAME]. I was told some minor leader wanted to speak us...
TEXT.French: Bonjour, [CT_NAME]. On m'a dit qu'un petit chef voulait nous parler...
TEXT.German: Guten Tag, [CT_NAME]. Was beschert mir diese unerwartete Störung?
TEXT.Italian: Buongiorno a te, [CT_NAME]. A cosa dobbiamo questa interruzione inaspettata?
TEXT.Spanish: Buenos días tengáis, [CT_NAME]. ¿A qué debemos esta interrupción tan inesperada?

TEXT.English: Hi, [CT_NAME]. I was told some minor leader wanted to speak us...
TEXT.French: Bonjour, [CT_NAME]. On m'a dit qu'un petit chef voulait nous parler...
TEXT.German: Guten Tag, [CT_NAME]. Was beschert mir diese unerwartete Störung?
TEXT.Italian: Buongiorno a te, [CT_NAME]. A cosa dobbiamo questa interruzione inaspettata?
TEXT.Spanish: Buenos días tengáis, [CT_NAME]. ¿A qué debemos esta interrupción tan inesperada?

TEXT.English: Let your heart feel for the afflictions and distress of everyone, [CT_NAME], and let your hand give in proportion to your purse. This seems about right.
TEXT.French: Dans la vie, les meilleures choses ne s'achètent pas, [CT_NAME]. Malheureusement, notre amitié n'en fait pas partie.
TEXT.German: Die besten Dinge im Leben gibt's umsonst, [CT_NAME]. Nur leider gehört der Fortbestand unserer freundschaftlichen Beziehungen nicht dazu!
TEXT.Italian: Le cose più belle della vita non hanno prezzo, [CT_NAME]. Sfortunatamente, la nostra lunga amicizia non è fra queste.
TEXT.Spanish: Las mejores cosas de la vida son las que salen gratis, [CT_NAME]. Por desgracia, la continuidad de nuestra amistad no es una de ellas.

TEXT.English: Your deputy [OUR_NAME] has come to you, [CT_NAME]. I ask of you these presents with which to welcome me to your home.
TEXT.French: Les dieux veulent des sacrifices, [CT_NAME]. Si votre civilisation veut durer, je vous conseille de vous plier à mes exigences.
TEXT.German: Die Götter fordern Opfer, [CT_NAME]! Wenn Eure Zivilisation überleben soll, wärt Ihr gut beraten, dieser Forderung nachzukommen!
TEXT.Italian: Gli dei richiedono un sacrificio, [CT_NAME]. Affinché la tua civiltà possa continuare a esistere, ti consiglio di farlo.
TEXT.Spanish: Los dioses exigen un sacrificio, [CT_NAME]. Si vuestra civilización quiere vivir largo tiempo, os recomendamos que lo realicéis.

TEXT.English: [CT_NAME], you claim this mother of ours, the earth, for your own use. But will you not share a little?
TEXT.French: Voudriez-vous partager votre richesse avec vos amis et alliés, [CT_NAME] ?
TEXT.German: Wärt Ihr bereit, Euren Wohlstand mit guten Freunden und verlässlichen Verbündeten zu teilen, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Italian: Vuoi condividere un po' delle tue ricchezze con i tuoi buoni amici e alleati, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Os importaría compartir parte de vuestra riqueza con vuestros amigos y aliados, [CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: The simplest strategy is for me to ask you for what we need and hope your good will wins out.
TEXT.French: Le plus simple serait de vous demander de nous aider en espérant que votre bonne volonté fera le reste.
TEXT.German: Es ist für mich die einfachste Strategie, Euch um das zu bitten, was wir benötigen, und darauf zu hoffen, dass Euer guter Wille siegt.
TEXT.Italian: La strategia più semplice per me è chiederti quello che ci serve e sperare nella tua buona volontà.
TEXT.Spanish: La estrategia más sencilla para mí es pediros lo que necesitamos y rezar porque vuestra buena voluntad se imponga.

TEXT.English: The simplest strategy is for me to ask you for what we need and hope your good will wins out.
TEXT.French: Le plus simple serait de vous demander de nous aider en espérant que votre bonne volonté fera le reste.
TEXT.German: Es ist für mich die einfachste Strategie, Euch um das zu bitten, was wir benötigen, und darauf zu hoffen, dass Euer guter Wille siegt.
TEXT.Italian: La strategia più semplice per me è chiederti quello che ci serve e sperare nella tua buona volontà.
TEXT.Spanish: La estrategia más sencilla para mí es pediros lo que necesitamos y rezar porque vuestra buena voluntad se imponga.

TEXT.English: The [CT_CIV_ADJ] people are in great need, [CT_NAME]. Do not disappoint us.
TEXT.French: Les [CT_CIV_ADJ] sont dans le besoin, [CT_NAME]. J'espère que vous ne les décevrez pas.
TEXT.German: Das [CT_CIV_ADJ:3] Volk befindet sich in einer üblen Notlage, [CT_NAME]! Enttäuscht uns nicht!
TEXT.Italian: Il popolo [CT_CIV_ADJ:1] vive nell'indigenza, [CT_NAME]. Non deluderci.
TEXT.Spanish: El pueblo [CT_CIV_ADJ:1] tiene una gran necesidad, [CT_NAME]. No nos decepcionéis.

TEXT.English: The [CT_CIV_ADJ] people are in great need, [CT_NAME]. Do not disappoint us.
TEXT.French: Les [CT_CIV_ADJ] sont dans le besoin, [CT_NAME]. J'espère que vous ne les décevrez pas.
TEXT.German: Das [CT_CIV_ADJ:3] Volk befindet sich in einer üblen Notlage, [CT_NAME]! Enttäuscht uns nicht!
TEXT.Italian: Il popolo [CT_CIV_ADJ:1] vive nell'indigenza, [CT_NAME]. Non deluderci.
TEXT.Spanish: El pueblo [CT_CIV_ADJ:1] tiene una gran necesidad, [CT_NAME]. No nos decepcionéis.

TEXT.English: The [CT_CIV_ADJ] people are in great need, [CT_NAME]. Do not disappoint us.
TEXT.French: Les [CT_CIV_ADJ] sont dans le besoin, [CT_NAME]. J'espère que vous ne les décevrez pas.
TEXT.German: Das [CT_CIV_ADJ:3] Volk befindet sich in einer üblen Notlage, [CT_NAME]! Enttäuscht uns nicht!
TEXT.Italian: Il popolo [CT_CIV_ADJ:1] vive nell'indigenza, [CT_NAME]. Non deluderci.
TEXT.Spanish: El pueblo [CT_CIV_ADJ:1] tiene una gran necesidad, [CT_NAME]. No nos decepcionéis.

TEXT.English: Worry is the interest paid by those who borrow trouble, [CT_NAME]. Do yourself a favour and give us this.
TEXT.French: Je ne vous mentirai pas, [CT_NAME] : nous voulons ce que vous avez, et dès que possible.
TEXT.German: Ich will gar nicht lange drumrumreden, [CT_NAME]: Wir wollen etwas, was Ihr besitzt! Also lasst es uns doch bitte so bald wie möglich zukommen!
TEXT.Italian: Non mentirò, [CT_NAME]: vogliamo la tua roba. Daccela gentilmente, ti conviene...
TEXT.Spanish: No os mentiremos, [CT_NAME], queremos algo de vosotros. Dádnoslo gentilmente en cuanto os sea posible.

TEXT.English: I pray to our Gods that you will not make me send my warriors into your house. They would cast you out of it and overthrow your rule. When you tried to recover what you had lost, it would be too late.
TEXT.French: L'[OUR_EMPIRE] vous demande un modeste présent, [CT_NAME]. Mais si vous préférez, nous pouvons nous battre jusqu'à la mort.
TEXT.German: Das [OUR_EMPIRE:2] fordert eine kleine Spende von Euch, [CT_NAME]. Wenn es Euch lieber ist, können wir aber auch so lange gegeneinander kämpfen, bis nur noch einer von uns übrig ist!
TEXT.Italian: L'[OUR_EMPIRE] ti richiede una piccola donazione, [CT_NAME]. Altrimenti, se preferisci, combatteremo finché una delle due nazioni non sarà distrutta.
TEXT.Spanish: El [OUR_EMPIRE] os pide una pequeña donación, [CT_NAME]. O, si lo preferís, podemos combatir hasta que una de las dos naciones quede destruida.

TEXT.English: The [CT_CIV_ADJ] know how to make everything, but not how to distribute it. Or would you prove me wrong?
TEXT.French: Au nom de l'amitié qui lie nos grands peuples, j'exige que vous nous donniez ceci en gage d'estime.
TEXT.German: Zum Wohle der fortgesetzten Freundschaft unserer großartigen Völker fordere ich ein Zeichen Eurer Anerkennung!
TEXT.Italian: Per il bene della duratura amicizia tra i nostri grandi popoli ti chiedo ciò di cui abbiamo bisogno come segno di riconoscimento.
TEXT.Spanish: En aras de que continúe la amistad entre nuestros dos grandes pueblos, os solicito una muestra de vuestro aprecio.

TEXT.English: Our armies are evenly matched, but I believe in a battle I would win out. So that this does not occur I ask you to meet our demands.
TEXT.French: Nos armées sont de force égale, mais je crois que nous gagnerions en cas de guerre. Si vous voulez éviter cela, veuillez accéder à nos demandes.
TEXT.German: Unsere Armeen sind ebenbürtig, aber ich denke, ich würde einen Kampf gewinnen. Damit das nicht geschieht, solltet Ihr unseren Forderungen nachkommen.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri eserciti si equivalgono, ma sono sicuro che in una battaglia vincerei io. Affinché ciò non accada, ti chiedo di soddisfare le nostre richieste.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros ejércitos están a la par, aunque creo que yo ganaría si lucharan. Así que, para que esto no ocurra, os pido que satisfagáis mis exigencias.

TEXT.English: Our armies are evenly matched, but I believe in a battle I would win out. So that this does not occur I ask you to meet our demands.
TEXT.French: Nos armées sont de force égale, mais je crois que nous gagnerions en cas de guerre. Si vous voulez éviter cela, veuillez accéder à nos demandes.
TEXT.German: Unsere Armeen sind ebenbürtig, aber ich denke, ich würde einen Kampf gewinnen. Damit das nicht geschieht, solltet Ihr unseren Forderungen nachkommen.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri eserciti si equivalgono, ma sono sicuro che in una battaglia vincerei io. Affinché ciò non accada, ti chiedo di soddisfare le nostre richieste.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros ejércitos están a la par, aunque creo que yo ganaría si lucharan. Así que, para que esto no ocurra, os pido que satisfagáis mis exigencias.

TEXT.English: We have needs, [CT_NAME]. Please comply.
TEXT.French: Nous avons des besoins, [CT_NAME]. Veuillez les satisfaire.
TEXT.German: Auch wir haben Bedürfnisse, [CT_NAME]! Und es ist an Euch, sie zu befriedigen!
TEXT.Italian: Abbiamo delle necessità, [CT_NAME]. Ti preghiamo di accettarle.
TEXT.Spanish: Tenemos necesidades, [CT_NAME]. Satisfacedlas, por favor.

TEXT.English: We have needs, [CT_NAME]. Please comply.
TEXT.French: Nous avons des besoins, [CT_NAME]. Veuillez les satisfaire.
TEXT.German: Auch wir haben Bedürfnisse, [CT_NAME]! Und es ist an Euch, sie zu befriedigen!
TEXT.Italian: Abbiamo delle necessità, [CT_NAME]. Ti preghiamo di accettarle.
TEXT.Spanish: Tenemos necesidades, [CT_NAME]. Satisfacedlas, por favor.

TEXT.English: We have needs, [CT_NAME]. Please comply.
TEXT.French: Nous avons des besoins, [CT_NAME]. Veuillez les satisfaire.
TEXT.German: Auch wir haben Bedürfnisse, [CT_NAME]! Und es ist an Euch, sie zu befriedigen!
TEXT.Italian: Abbiamo delle necessità, [CT_NAME]. Ti preghiamo di accettarle.
TEXT.Spanish: Tenemos necesidades, [CT_NAME]. Satisfacedlas, por favor.

TEXT.English: War is an act of violence whose object is to constrain the enemy, to accomplish our will. Don't think we won't go there, [CT_NAME]! This is the price of peace.
TEXT.French: Ne considérez pas ceci comme un tribut, [CT_NAME], mais comme un investissement en faveur de la paix mondiale.
TEXT.German: Betrachtet diesen Tribut nicht als Forderung, [CT_NAME], sondern als Investition in den Weltfrieden.
TEXT.Italian: Questa non è una semplice richiesta di pagamento di tributi, [CT_NAME]. Diciamo che è un investimento sulla pace nel mondo.
TEXT.Spanish: No creáis que os estamos exigiendo un tributo, [CT_NAME]. Pensad en ello como en una inversión en la paz mundial.

TEXT.English: These are [OUR_NAME]'s demands, [CT_NAME]. Should you displease me, I will punish you by sending my hosts of brave warriors against you.
TEXT.French: Votre faiblesse est méprisable, [CT_NAME] ! Donnez-nous ce que nous voulons ou ce sera la mort !
TEXT.German: Ihr seid unsäglich jämmerlich und schwach, [CT_NAME]! Gebt uns, was wir verlangen, oder sterbt!
TEXT.Italian: La tua debolezza è imbarazzante, #CT_NAME! Dacci ciò che vogliamo o morirai!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Vuestra debilidad es despreciable, [CT_NAME]! ¡Dadnos lo que queremos o pereced!

TEXT.English: God put in your heart certain wishes and plans; in my heart He put different desires. You must give the [OUR_EMPIRE] this.
TEXT.French: Il n'est pas sage de priver de nourriture un ours affamé, [CT_NAME]. Vous risquez de vous faire déchiqueter.
TEXT.German: Es wäre nicht besonders klug, einem hungrigen Bär sein Futter zu verweigern, [CT_NAME]. Ihr würdet Euch nur selbst schaden.
TEXT.Italian: Non è saggio negare il cibo a un orso affamato, [CT_NAME]. Rischi di prenderle.
TEXT.Spanish: Es poco prudente quitarle la comida a un oso hambriento, [CT_NAME]. Si os ataca, será culpa vuestra.

TEXT.English: You are outgunned and outclassed. I suggest you give me what I demand.
TEXT.French: Vous êtes inférieurs en nombre et en armes. Je vous suggère de me donner ce que je veux.
TEXT.German: Ihr seid uns in jeder Hinsicht unterlegen. Ich schlage vor, Ihr gebt mir, was ich verlange.
TEXT.Italian: Ti supero in classe ed equipaggiamento. Ti suggerisco di darmi quello che voglio.
TEXT.Spanish: Os superamos en armas y en hombres. Os sugiero que nos deis lo que exijo.

TEXT.English: You are outgunned and outclassed. I suggest you give me what I demand.
TEXT.French: Vous êtes inférieurs en nombre et en armes. Je vous suggère de me donner ce que je veux.
TEXT.German: Ihr seid uns in jeder Hinsicht unterlegen. Ich schlage vor, Ihr gebt mir, was ich verlange.
TEXT.Italian: Ti supero in classe ed equipaggiamento. Ti suggerisco di darmi quello che voglio.
TEXT.Spanish: Os superamos en armas y en hombres. Os sugiero que nos deis lo que exijo.

TEXT.English: Give [OUR_CIV_SHORT] what is due her, [CT_NAME]! We shall not ask a second time.
TEXT.French: Donnez aux [CT_CIV_SHORT] ce qui leur revient, [CT_NAME] ! Nous ne vous le demanderons pas deux fois.
TEXT.German: Gebt [CT_CIV_SHORT], was ihm zusteht, [CT_NAME]! Wir werden Euch kein zweites Mal darum bitten!
TEXT.Italian: Dona ciò che ti richiede [CT_CIV_SHORT:2], [CT_NAME]! Non te lo chiederemo una seconda volta!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Dadle a [CT_CIV_SHORT] lo que le corresponde, [CT_NAME]! No os lo pediremos otra vez.

TEXT.English: Give [OUR_CIV_SHORT] what is due her, [CT_NAME]! We shall not ask a second time.
TEXT.French: Donnez aux [CT_CIV_SHORT] ce qui leur revient, [CT_NAME] ! Nous ne vous le demanderons pas deux fois.
TEXT.German: Gebt [CT_CIV_SHORT], was ihm zusteht, [CT_NAME]! Wir werden Euch kein zweites Mal darum bitten!
TEXT.Italian: Dona ciò che ti richiede [CT_CIV_SHORT:2], [CT_NAME]! Non te lo chiederemo una seconda volta!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Dadle a [CT_CIV_SHORT] lo que le corresponde, [CT_NAME]! No os lo pediremos otra vez.

TEXT.English: Give [OUR_CIV_SHORT] what is due her, [CT_NAME]! We shall not ask a second time.
TEXT.French: Donnez aux [CT_CIV_SHORT] ce qui leur revient, [CT_NAME] ! Nous ne vous le demanderons pas deux fois.
TEXT.German: Gebt [CT_CIV_SHORT], was ihm zusteht, [CT_NAME]! Wir werden Euch kein zweites Mal darum bitten!
TEXT.Italian: Dona ciò che ti richiede [CT_CIV_SHORT:2], [CT_NAME]! Non te lo chiederemo una seconda volta!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Dadle a [CT_CIV_SHORT] lo que le corresponde, [CT_NAME]! No os lo pediremos otra vez.

TEXT.English: Fine.
TEXT.French: Très bien.
TEXT.German: Gut.
TEXT.Italian: Bene.
TEXT.Spanish: Muy bien.

TEXT.English: You have an ideal land for [BOLD]%s1[\BOLD], near to %s2. That's why an agronomist waits you in Europe to plant it in the New World.
TEXT.French: Vous avez une terre idéale pour le [BOLD]%s1[\BOLD], près de %s2. Voilà pourquoi un agronome vous attend en Europe pour en planter dans le nouveau monde.
TEXT.German: You have an ideal land for [BOLD]%s1[\BOLD], near to %s2. That's why an agronomist waits you in Europe to plant it in the New World.
TEXT.Italian: You have an ideal land for [BOLD]%s1[\BOLD], near to %s2. That's why an agronomist waits you in Europe to plant it in the New World.
TEXT.Spanish: You have an ideal land for [BOLD]%s1[\BOLD], near to %s2. That's why an agronomist waits you in Europe to plant it in the New World.

TEXT.English: You just have the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_REVERT] plant and suitable lands for its cultivation. I just appoint [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT] an agronomist to expect %s2[COLOR_REVERT] in order to you begin the production. Do your best to meet the demand.
TEXT.French: Vous détenez le plant [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_REVERT] et une terre adaptée à sa culture. Je viens de mandater [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]un agronome qui vous attend %s2[COLOR_REVERT] afin que vous en commenciez la production. Veillez à satisfaire au mieux la demande.
TEXT.German: You just have the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_REVERT] plant and suitable lands for its cultivation. I just appoint [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT] an agronomist to expect %s2[COLOR_REVERT] in order to you begin the production. Do your best to meet the demand.
TEXT.Italian: You just have the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_REVERT] plant and suitable lands for its cultivation. I just appoint [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT] an agronomist to expect %s2[COLOR_REVERT] in order to you begin the production. Do your best to meet the demand.
TEXT.Spanish: You just have the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_REVERT] plant and suitable lands for its cultivation. I just appoint [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT] an agronomist to expect %s2[COLOR_REVERT] in order to you begin the production. Do your best to meet the demand.

TEXT.English: One of your teamate has discovered a new plant and plan to produce it. Follow %s1 in the quest to produce new ressources in the new world. You will find an [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]agronomist[COLOR_REVERT] in Europe. Do your best to meet the demand.
TEXT.French: Un de vos équipier a découvert un nouveau plant et va commencer à en cultiver dans ses colonies. Suivez %s1 dans son initiative à produire dans le nouveau monde. Un [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]agronome[COLOR_REVERT] vous attend en Europe afin que vous commenciez à produire. Veillez à satisfaire au mieux la demande.
TEXT.German: One of your teamate has discovered a new plant and plan to produce it. Follow %s1 in the quest to produce new ressources in the new world. You will find an [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]agronomist[COLOR_REVERT] in Europe. Do your best to meet the demand.
TEXT.Italian: One of your teamate has discovered a new plant and plan to produce it. Follow %s1 in the quest to produce new ressources in the new world. You will find an [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]agronomist[COLOR_REVERT] in Europe. Do your best to meet the demand.
TEXT.Spanish: One of your teamate has discovered a new plant and plan to produce it. Follow %s1 in the quest to produce new ressources in the new world. You will find an [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]agronomist[COLOR_REVERT] in Europe. Do your best to meet the demand.

TEXT.English: Fine.
TEXT.French: Nous exaucerons votre souhait de mettre à profit les terres des colonies, votre altesse.
TEXT.German: Gut.
TEXT.Italian: Bene.
TEXT.Spanish: Muy bien.

TEXT.English: in Europe
TEXT.French: en Europe
TEXT.German: in Europe
TEXT.Italian: in Europe
TEXT.Spanish: in Europe

TEXT.English: at %s1
TEXT.French: à %s1
TEXT.German: at %s1
TEXT.Italian: at %s1
TEXT.Spanish: at %s1

TEXT.English: Our trade routes are not safe enough. You will find something to help you in Europe.[NEWLINE]Please make good use of it.
TEXT.French: Nos routes commerciales ne sont pas assez sûr. Vous trouverez de quoi vous aider en Europe.[NEWLINE]Faîtes en bon usage.
TEXT.German: Our trade routes are not safe enough. You will find something to help you in Europe.[NEWLINE]Please make good use of it.
TEXT.Italian: Our trade routes are not safe enough. You will find something to help you in Europe.[NEWLINE]Please make good use of it.
TEXT.Spanish: Our trade routes are not safe enough. You will find something to help you in Europe.[NEWLINE]Please make good use of it.

TEXT.English: The land surrounding the %s2 colony is rather suitable for crop production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_REVERT].[NEWLINE]Plant as soon as possible the resource and sell it into Europe.[NEWLINE]To increase your production and your profits, do not hesitate to improve each fam using an agronomist and enroll a new one in Europe.
TEXT.French: Les terres entourant la colonie %s2 sont plutôt adaptées à la production de culture de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_REVERT].[NEWLINE]Plantez au plus vite cette ressource et vendez la en Europe.[NEWLINE]Afin d'augmenter votre production et vos bénéfices, n'hésitez pas à améliorer chaque ferme à l'aide d'un agronome et en enrôler de nouveaux en Europe.
TEXT.German: The land surrounding the %s2 colony is rather suitable for crop production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_REVERT].[NEWLINE]Plant as soon as possible the resource and sell it into Europe [NEWLINE To increase your production and your profits, do not hesitate to improve each fam using an agronomist and enroll a new one in Europe.
TEXT.Italian: The land surrounding the %s2 colony is rather suitable for crop production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_REVERT].[NEWLINE]Plant as soon as possible the resource and sell it into Europe.[NEWLINE]To increase your production and your profits, do not hesitate to improve each fam using an agronomist and enroll a new one in Europe.
TEXT.Spanish: The land surrounding the %s2 colony is rather suitable for crop production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_REVERT].[NEWLINE]Plant as soon as possible the resource and sell it into Europe.[NEWLINE]To increase your production and your profits, do not hesitate to improve each fam using an agronomist and enroll a new one in Europe.

TEXT.English: Fine.
TEXT.French: Nous exaucerons votre souhait de mettre à profit les terres des colonies, votre altesse.
TEXT.German: Gut.
TEXT.Italian: Bene.
TEXT.Spanish: Muy bien.

TEXT.English: I think it is the time to send an explorer to visit this new world. An explorer waits you in Europe.
TEXT.French: Je pense qu'il est temps d'envoyer un explorateur visiter ce nouveau monde. Un explorateur vous attend en Europe.
TEXT.German: I think it is the time to send an explorer to visit this new world. An explorer waits you in Europe.
TEXT.Italian: I think it is the time to send an explorer to visit this new world. An explorer waits you in Europe.
TEXT.Spanish: I think it is the time to send an explorer to visit this new world. An explorer waits you in Europe.

TEXT.English: At your orders, your Majesty.
TEXT.French: A vos ordres, votre Majesté.
TEXT.German: At your orders, your Majesty.
TEXT.Italian: At your orders, your Majesty.
TEXT.Spanish: At your orders, your Majesty.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]However you must take at your own expense:
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]Cependant vous devrez prendre à vos frais :
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE]However you must take at your own expense:
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE]However you must take at your own expense:
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE]However you must take at your own expense:

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]- Enlisting a crew
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]- L'enrôlement d'un équipage
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE]- Enlisting a crew
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE]- Enlisting a crew
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE]- Enlisting a crew

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]- The ship armament
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]- L'armement du navire
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE]- The ship armament
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE]- The ship armament
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE]- The ship armament

TEXT.English: Your gift will help us tremendously, your Majesty
TEXT.French: Votre présent nous sera d'une aide considérable, votre Majesté.
TEXT.German: Your gift will help us tremendously, your Majesty
TEXT.Italian: Your gift will help us tremendously, your Majesty
TEXT.Spanish: Your gift will help us tremendously, your Majesty

TEXT.English: Your allegiance is an example of obedience. You deserve a naval escort payed by the crown.
TEXT.French: Votre allégeance est un exemple de servitude. Vous méritez amplement une escorte navale aux frais de la couronne.
TEXT.German: Your allegiance is an example of obedience. You deserve a naval escort payed by the crown.
TEXT.Italian: Your allegiance is an example of obedience. You deserve a naval escort payed by the crown.
TEXT.Spanish: Your allegiance is an example of obedience. You deserve a naval escort payed by the crown.

TEXT.English: I bow to your magnanimity, your Majesty.
TEXT.French: Je me prosterne devant votre magnanimité, votre Majesté.
TEXT.German: I bow to your magnanimity, your Majesty.
TEXT.Italian: I bow to your magnanimity, your Majesty.
TEXT.Spanish: I bow to your magnanimity, your Majesty.

TEXT.English: I have been told that pirates are sailing across the new world. I offer you a naval escort to prevent any attack. However, since your attitude is unpleasant, you will have to pay for it. It will cost you %d1[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.French: Des bruits courent que des vaisseaux pirates naviguent le long des côtes du nouveau continent. Je vous propose de recevoir une escorte navale afin de contrecarrer d'éventuelles attaques. Cependant, votre attitude négative à mon égard vous impose d'en supporter la charge financière. Il vous en coûtera %d1[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.German: I have been told that pirates are sailing across the new world. I offer you a naval escort to prevent any attack. However, since your attitude is unpleasant, you will have to pay for it. It will cost you %d1[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Italian: I have been told that pirates are sailing across the new world. I offer you a naval escort to prevent any attack. However, since your attitude is unpleasant, you will have to pay for it. It will cost you %d1[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Spanish: I have been told that pirates are sailing across the new world. I offer you a naval escort to prevent any attack. However, since your attitude is unpleasant, you will have to pay for it. It will cost you %d1[ICON_GOLD].

TEXT.English: I have great hope to see some colonies thriving in this new world.I offer you a new Merchantman and everything necessary to the foundation of a new coastal settlement. The kingdom believes on your dexterity, Viceroy, choose the right place. [NEWLINE] I will take all expenses, including expenses that the Indians could recover from you, whatever the cost.
TEXT.French: Bonjour à vous, mon cher! J'ai grand espoir de voir des colonies prospères dans ce nouveau monde. Je mets à votre disposition un nouveau navire marchand et tout le nécessaire à la fondation d'une nouvelle colonie côtière. Le royaume compte sur votre dextérité, Vice-roi, choisissez bien le lieu.[NEWLINE]Je prends à ma charge tous les frais, y compris les indemnités que les indiens pourraient vous réclamer, quelqu'en soit le prix.
TEXT.German: I have great hope to see some colonies thriving in this new world.I offer you a new Merchantman and everything necessary to the foundation of a new coastal settlement. The kingdom believes on your dexterity, Viceroy, choose the right place. [NEWLINE] I will take all expenses, including expenses that the Indians could recover from you, whatever the cost.
TEXT.Italian: I have great hope to see some colonies thriving in this new world.I offer you a new Merchantman and everything necessary to the foundation of a new coastal settlement. The kingdom believes on your dexterity, Viceroy, choose the right place. [NEWLINE] I will take all expenses, including expenses that the Indians could recover from you, whatever the cost.
TEXT.Spanish: I have great hope to see some colonies thriving in this new world.I offer you a new Merchantman and everything necessary to the foundation of a new coastal settlement. The kingdom believes on your dexterity, Viceroy, choose the right place. [NEWLINE] I will take all expenses, including expenses that the Indians could recover from you, whatever the cost.

TEXT.English: Hello my dear! The kingdom would greatly appreciate the installation of a new colony in the New World.[NEWLINE]For this second colony, I would like you to settle in the land, close to %s1.[NEWLINE]We expect good profits for the crown, so be sure to choose the right place of its foundation.[NEWLINE]I provided you with the convoy builder and two settlers to help you in this endeavor. I take all the expenses and the indemnity that the Indians may claim from you.
TEXT.French: Bonjour à vous mon cher ! Le royaume apprécierait fortement l'installation d'une nouvelle colonie dans le nouveau monde. [NEWLINE]Pour cette deuxième colonie, je souhaiterai que vous vous installiez dans les terres, à proximité de %s1. [NEWLINE]Nous attendons de bons profits pour la couronne, alors veillez à bien choisir le lieu de sa fondation.[NEWLINE]Je vous fourni le convoi bâtisseur et deux colons pour vous aider dans cette entreprise. Je prends tous les frais ma charge et l'indemnité que les indiens pourraient vous réclamer.
TEXT.German: Hello my dear! The kingdom would greatly appreciate the installation of a new colony in the New World.[NEWLINE]For this second colony, I would like you to settle in the land, close to %s1.[NEWLINE]We expect good profits for the crown, so be sure to choose the right place of its foundation.[NEWLINE]I provided you with the convoy builder and two settlers to help you in this endeavor. I take all the expenses and the indemnity that the Indians may claim from you.

The kingdom would greatly appreciate the installation of a new colony in the New World.[NEWLINE]For this second colony, I would like you to settle in the land, close to %s1.[NEWLINE]We expect good profits for the crown, so be sure to choose the right place of its foundation.[NEWLINE]I provided you with the convoy builder and two settlers to help you in this endeavor. I take all the expenses and the indemnity that the Indians may claim from you.

The kingdom would greatly appreciate the installation of a new colony in the New World.[NEWLINE]For this second colony, I would like you to settle in the land, close to %s1.[NEWLINE]We expect good profits for the crown, so be sure to choose the right place of its foundation.[NEWLINE]I provided you with the convoy builder and two settlers to help you in this endeavor. I take all the expenses and the indemnity that the Indians may claim from you.

TEXT.English: Hello to you my dear![NEWLINE]Decidedly this continent is full of hope, dear Viceroy, that's why I authorize you to found a new colony.[NEWLINE]I think favorable and useful to establish it on the coasts.[NEWLINE]I have provided you everything necessary to found this new colony.[NEWLINE]A ship is at your disposal for this mission.[NEWLINE]The profits for the crown will henceforth become more serious. Overall, I would recommend it !!
TEXT.French: Bonjour à vous mon cher ![NEWLINE]Décidément ce continent est plein d'espoir, cher Vice-Roi, c'est pourquoi je vous autorise à fonder une nouvelle colonie.[NEWLINE]Je pense favorable et utile de l'établir sur les côtes. [NEWLINE]Je vous fourni tout le nécessaire pour fonder cette nouvelle colonie.[NEWLINE]Un navire est à votre disposition pour cette mission.[NEWLINE]Les profits pour la couronne devront dorénavant devenir plus sérieux. En tout, je vous le recommande !!

TEXT.English: Thank you, your Majesty. Be sure that we deserve your trust.
TEXT.French: Merci, votre Majesté. Vous pouvez être sûr que nous saurons mériter la confiance que vous nous octroyez.
TEXT.German: Thank you, your Majesty. Be sure that we deserve your trust.
TEXT.Italian: Thank you, your Majesty. Be sure that we deserve your trust.
TEXT.Spanish: Thank you, your Majesty. Be sure that we deserve your trust.

TEXT.English: Good day, my dear! The wonderful treasures you have discovered must be routed to our motherland. [NEWLINE] You will find a galleon in %s2 ready to sail. [NEWLINE] Our finances impose us to require you to do share it cost ... The modest sum of %d1 [ICON_GOLD] will be paid on your assets.
TEXT.French: Bonjour à vous, mon cher! Les trésors merveilleux que vous avez découverts doivent à tout prix être acheminés vers notre mère patrie.[NEWLINE]Vous trouverez en %s2 un galion prêt à appareiller. [NEWLINE]Nos finances nous imposent de vous en faire partager le coût . La modique somme de %d1[ICON_GOLD] sera portée sur vos avoirs.
TEXT.German: Good day, my dear! The wonderful treasures you have discovered must be routed to our motherland. [NEWLINE] You will find a galleon in %s2 ready to sail. [NEWLINE] Our finances impose us to require you to do share it cost ... The modest sum of %d1 [ICON_GOLD] will be paid on your assets.
TEXT.Italian: Good day, my dear! The wonderful treasures you have discovered must be routed to our motherland. [NEWLINE] You will find a galleon in %s2 ready to sail. [NEWLINE] Our finances impose us to require you to do share it cost ... The modest sum of %d1% [ICON_GOLD] will be paid on your assets.
TEXT.Spanish: Good day, my dear! The wonderful treasures you have discovered must be routed to our motherland. [NEWLINE] You will find a galleon in %s2 ready to sail. [NEWLINE] Our finances impose us to require you to do share it cost ... The modest sum of %d1 [ICON_GOLD] will be paid on your assets.

TEXT.English: Thank you, your Majesty. This will serve considerably to the development of our colonies.
TEXT.French: Merci, votre Altesse. Cela servira considérablement au développement de nos colonies.
TEXT.German: Thank you, your Majesty. This will serve considerably to the development of our colonies.
TEXT.Italian: Thank you, your Majesty. This will serve considerably to the development of our colonies.
TEXT.Spanish: Thank you, your Majesty. This will serve considerably to the development of our colonies.

TEXT.English: I am sorry your highness, I prefer to spend me of this galleon.
TEXT.French: Je regrette votre altesse, je préfère me passer de ce galion.
TEXT.German: I am sorry your highness, I prefer to spend me of this galleon.
TEXT.Italian: I am sorry your highness, I prefer to spend me of this galleon.
TEXT.Spanish: I am sorry your highness, I prefer to spend me of this galleon.

TEXT.English: I offer you a new transport ship and a naval escort to help you with the protection of your wagon trains, but your debt will now be %d1_new[ICON_GOLD]. You may kiss my ring.
TEXT.French: Je vous propose de recevoir un nouveau navire de commerce en plus d'une Escorte Navale afin de veiller à la protection des convois, mais votre dette sera désormais de %d1_new[ICON_GOLD]. Vous pouvez embrasser ma bague.
TEXT.German: I offer you a new transport ship and a naval escort to help you with the protection of your wagon trains, but your debt will now be %d1_new[ICON_GOLD]. You may kiss my ring.
TEXT.Italian: I offer you a new transport ship and a naval escort to help you with the protection of your wagon trains, but your debt will now be %d1_new[ICON_GOLD]. You may kiss my ring.
TEXT.Spanish: I offer you a new transport ship and a naval escort to help you with the protection of your wagon trains, but your debt will now be %d1_new[ICON_GOLD]. You may kiss my ring.

TEXT.English: Thank you, your majesty. I shall make sure that our trade routes be safe from now on.
TEXT.French: Merci, votre Majesté. Je ferai en sorte que nos routes commerciales soient enfin plus sûrs.
TEXT.German: Thank you, your majesty. I shall make sure that our trade routes be safe from now on.
TEXT.Italian: Thank you, your majesty. I shall make sure that our trade routes be safe from now on.
TEXT.Spanish: Thank you, your majesty. I shall make sure that our trade routes be safe from now on.

TEXT.English: I was told that your transport ship has been sunk. Take this one and take note that your debt will now be %d1_new[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.French: Votre navire de commerce a été coulé me dit-on ! Prenez possession de celui-ci et prenez note que votre dette sera désormais de %d1_new[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.German: I was told that your transport ship has been sunk. Take this one and take note that your debt will now be %d1_new[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Italian: I was told that your transport ship has been sunk. Take this one and take note that your debt will now be %d1_new[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Spanish: I was told that your transport ship has been sunk. Take this one and take note that but your debt will now be %d1_new[ICON_GOLD].

TEXT.English: At Your Orders , your Majesty.
TEXT.French: A vos ordres, votre Majesté.
TEXT.German: At Your Orders , your Majesty.
TEXT.Italian: At Your Orders , your Majesty.
TEXT.Spanish: At Your Orders , your Majesty.

TEXT.English: My messengers have informed me that a pirate has attacked us. This situation is unbearable! Take ths escort of %d1 ship(s) and eradicate these dogs form our trade routes. It will cost you %d2[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.French: Des messagers viennent de m'informer qu'un pirate a mené une attaque contre nous. Cette situation est insupportable ! Prenez possession de %d1 escorte(s) navale(s) et éradiquez ces chiens de nos routes commerciales. Cela vous en coûtera %d2[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.German: My messengers have informed me that a pirate has attacked us. This situation is unbearable! Take ths escort of %d1 ship(s) and eradicate these dogs form our trade routes. It will cost you %d2[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Italian: My messengers have informed me that a pirate has attacked us. This situation is unbearable! Take ths escort of %d1 ship(s) and eradicate these dogs form our trade routes. It will cost you %d2[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Spanish: My messengers have informed me that a pirate has attacked us. This situation is unbearable! Take ths escort of %d1 ship(s) and eradicate these dogs form our trade routes. It will cost you %d2[ICON_GOLD].

TEXT.English: Your help is precious, your Majesty.
TEXT.French: Cette aide nous sera grandement précieuse, votre Majesté.
TEXT.German: Your help is precious, your Majesty.
TEXT.Italian: Your help is precious, your Majesty.
TEXT.Spanish: Your help is precious, your Majesty.

TEXT.English: I shall manage to cope with these ennemies, your Highness, and I will cut these pirates into pieces on my own.
TEXT.French: Je saurai faire face à l'adversité, votre Altesse, et tailler ces pirates en pièces par mes propres moyens !
TEXT.German: I shall manage to cope with these ennemies, your Highness, and I will cut these pirates into pieces on my own.
TEXT.Italian: I shall manage to cope with these ennemies, your Highness, and I will cut these pirates into pieces on my own.
TEXT.Spanish: I shall manage to cope with these ennemies, your Highness, and I will cut these pirates into pieces on my own.

TEXT.English: Your confidence is annoying me ! Maintain our trade routes or you will taste our royal jail.
TEXT.French: Votre confiance m'exaspère ! Veillez à maintenir les routes commerciales ou vous connaîtrez l'odeur de mes geôles royales.
TEXT.German: Your confidence is annoying me ! Maintain our trade routes or you will taste our royal jail.
TEXT.Italian: Your confidence is annoying me ! Maintain our trade routes or you will taste our royal jail.
TEXT.Spanish: Your confidence is annoying me ! Maintain our trade routes or you will taste our royal jail.

TEXT.English: Very well, your Majesty.
TEXT.French: Bien, votre Majesté.
TEXT.German: Very well, your Majesty.
TEXT.Italian: Very well, your Majesty.
TEXT.Spanish: Very well, your Majesty.

TEXT.English: I take note of our agreement. My books telle my your debt amounts to %d1_new_rate.
TEXT.French: Je prends note de votre accord. Mes livres m'indique que votre dette s'éléve désormais à %d1_new_rate.
TEXT.German: I take note of our agreement. My books telle my your debt amounts to %d1_new_rate.
TEXT.Italian: I take note of our agreement. My books telle my your debt amounts to %d1_new_rate.
TEXT.Spanish: I take note of our agreement. My books telle my your debt amounts to %d1_new_rate.

TEXT.English: Thank you, your majesty.
TEXT.French: Merci, votre Altesse.
TEXT.German: Danke, Eure Majestät.
TEXT.Italian: Grazie, vostra maestà.
TEXT.Spanish: Gracias, Majestad.

TEXT.English: I owe you, your Majesty. I accept your offer whatever the price may be.
TEXT.French: Je vous suis redevable, votre Majesté. J'accepte malgré tout de recevoir ce navire quelqu'en soit le prix à payer.
TEXT.German: I owe you, your Majesty. I accept your offer whatever the price may be.
TEXT.Italian: I owe you, your Majesty. I accept your offer whatever the price may be.
TEXT.Spanish: I owe you, your Majesty. I accept your offer whatever the price may be.

TEXT.English: No thank you, you Majesty. I think I can say that I have the situation under control.
TEXT.French: Non Merci, votre Majesté. Je pense pouvoir affirmer que je maîtrise parfaitement la situation.
TEXT.German: No thank you, you Majesty. I think I can say that I have the situation under control.
TEXT.Italian: No thank you, you Majesty. I think I can say that I have the situation under control.
TEXT.Spanish: No thank you, you Majesty. I think I can say that I have the situation under control.

TEXT.English: I see you are an opportunist , Vice-Roy. My concelors were right about you. However I am happy to know that you are in charge of our colonies. Protect our ships and prevent any priate attack. Your total debt amounts to %d1[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.French: Je vois que vous êtes un opportuniste averti, vice-roi ! On m'a fait un portrait réaliste de vôtre personne, je suis malgré tout rassuré de vous savoir à la tête de nos colonies. Protégez nos navires et gardez-nous des attaques de pirates. Votre dette totale s'élève à %d1[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.German: I see you are an opportunist , Vice-Roy. My concelors were right about you. However I am happy to know that you are in charge of our colonies. Protect our ships and prevent any priate attack. Your total debt amounts to %d1[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Italian: I see you are an opportunist , Vice-Roy. My concelors were right about you. However I am happy to know that you are in charge of our colonies. Protect our ships and prevent any priate attack. Your total debt amounts to %d1[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Spanish: I see you are an opportunist , Vice-Roy. My concelors were right about you. However I am happy to know that you are in charge of our colonies. Protect our ships and prevent any priate attack. Your total debt amounts to %d1[ICON_GOLD].

TEXT.English: Please accept my regards, you Majesty.
TEXT.French: Acceptez mes respects, votre Majesté.
TEXT.German: Please accept my regards, you Majesty.
TEXT.Italian: Please accept my regards, you Majesty.
TEXT.Spanish: Please accept my regards, you Majesty.

TEXT.English: You refuse ?! What a fool ! You would better not lose a single ship or you will taste my anger.
TEXT.French: Vous refusez espèce de sombre idiot !? Je vous recommande de veillez à ne pas perdre un seul des navires marchands où vous sentirez passer mon courroux !
TEXT.German: You refuse ?! What a fool ! You would better not lose a single ship or you will taste my anger.
TEXT.Italian: You refuse ?! What a fool ! You would better not lose a single ship or you will taste my anger.
TEXT.Spanish: You refuse ?! What a fool ! You would better not lose a single ship or you will taste my anger.

TEXT.English: I shall try not to disapoint you, Sire.
TEXT.French: Je me fais fort de ne pas vous décevoir, Sire.
TEXT.German: I shall try not to disapoint you, Sire.
TEXT.Italian: I shall try not to disapoint you, Sire.
TEXT.Spanish: I shall try not to disapoint you, Sire.

TEXT.English: Remember you have contracted some debts, Viceroy!?[NEWLINE]The %d1[ICON_GOLD] that you owe me, weigh on the royal treasury. [NEWLINE]I urge you to promptly refund the money if you do not want to suffer penalties.
TEXT.French: Vous souvenez-vous avoir contracté quelques dettes, Vice-roi !?[NEWLINE]Les %d1[ICON_GOLD] que vous me devez pèsent sur le trésor royal.[NEWLINE]Je vous engage à rembourser rapidement cette somme si vous ne voulez pas subir de sanctions.
TEXT.German: Remember you have contracted some debts, Viceroy!?[NEWLINE]The %d1[ICON_GOLD] that you owe me, weigh on the royal treasury. [NEWLINE]I urge you to promptly refund the money if you do not want to suffer penalties.
TEXT.Italian: Remember you have contracted some debts, Viceroy!?[NEWLINE]The %d1[ICON_GOLD] that you owe me, weigh on the royal treasury. [NEWLINE]I urge you to promptly refund the money if you do not want to suffer penalties.
TEXT.Spanish: Remember you have contracted some debts, Viceroy!?[NEWLINE]The %d1[ICON_GOLD] that you owe me, weigh on the royal treasury. [NEWLINE]I urge you to promptly refund the money if you do not want to suffer penalties.

TEXT.English: I will sacrifice all my privilege to honor my debt, your Majesty.
TEXT.French: Je sacrifierai tous mes privilèges pour honorer ma dette, votre Majesté.
TEXT.German: I will sacrifice all my privilege to honor my debt, your Majesty.
TEXT.Italian: I will sacrifice all my privilege to honor my debt, your Majesty.
TEXT.Spanish: I will sacrifice all my privilege to honor my debt, your Majesty.

TEXT.English: You seem to have lost memory, Viceroy %s1. I remind you that your debt is %d2[ICON_GOLD]and that the deadbeat horrify me.[NEWLINE]As you forgot your homeworks, I allow you to have only %d3[ICON_GOLD]in your cash .[NEWLINE] From today I will come take regular the surplus of your gold coffers.[NEWLINE]Keep your note!
TEXT.French: Vous semblez avoir perdu la mémoire, Vice-roi %s1. Je vous rappelle que votre dette s'élève à %d2[ICON_GOLD]et que les mauvais payeurs me font horreur.[NEWLINE]Puisque vous oubliez vos devoirs, je ne vous autorise à posséder que %d3[ICON_GOLD] dans vos caisses.[NEWLINE]A compter de ce jour je viendrai, moi-même, prélever régulièrement le surplus d'or de vos coffres.[NEWLINE]Tenez le vous pour dit !
TEXT.German: You seem to have lost memory, Viceroy %s1. I remind you that your debt is %d2[ICON_GOLD]and that the deadbeat horrify me.[NEWLINE]As you forgot your homeworks, I allow you to have only %d3[ICON_GOLD]in your cash .[NEWLINE] From today I will come take regular the surplus of your gold coffers.[NEWLINE]Keep your note!
TEXT.Italian: You seem to have lost memory, Viceroy %s1. I remind you that your debt is %d2[ICON_GOLD]and that the deadbeat horrify me.[NEWLINE]As you forgot your homeworks, I allow you to have only %d3[ICON_GOLD]in your cash .[NEWLINE] From today I will come take regular the surplus of your gold coffers.[NEWLINE]Keep your note!
TEXT.Spanish: You seem to have lost memory, Viceroy %s1. I remind you that your debt is %d2[ICON_GOLD]and that the deadbeat horrify me.[NEWLINE]As you forgot your homeworks, I allow you to have only %d3[ICON_GOLD]in your cash .[NEWLINE] From today I will come take regular the surplus of your gold coffers.[NEWLINE]Keep your note!

TEXT.English: I bow to your right, your Highness ...
TEXT.French: Je me plie à votre raison, votre Altesse ...
TEXT.German: I bow to your right, your Highness ...
TEXT.Italian: I bow to your right, your Highness ...
TEXT.Spanish: I bow to your right, your Highness ...

TEXT.English: We all flare up last meeting. Our many years of friendships you serve yet again, Viceroy. [NEWLINE] You can take your time for d1% [ICON_GOLD] that you must still repay.
TEXT.French: Nous nous sommes tous emportés lors de notre dernière rencontre. Nos années d'amitiés vous serviront une fois de plus, Vice-roi.[NEWLINE]Vous pouvez prendre votre temps pour rembourser les %d1[ICON_GOLD] que vous devez au trésor royal.
TEXT.German: We all flare up last meeting. Our many years of friendships you serve yet again, Viceroy. [NEWLINE] You can take your time for d1% [ICON_GOLD] that you must still repay.
TEXT.Italian: We all flare up last meeting. Our many years of friendships you serve yet again, Viceroy. [NEWLINE] You can take your time for d1% [ICON_GOLD] that you must still repay.
TEXT.Spanish: We all flare up last meeting. Our many years of friendships you serve yet again, Viceroy. [NEWLINE] You can take your time for d1% [ICON_GOLD] that you must still repay.

TEXT.English: Accept my warmest thanks, Your Highness.
TEXT.French: Acceptez mes plus chaleureux remerciements, votre Altesse.
TEXT.German: Accept my warmest thanks, Your Highness.
TEXT.Italian: Accept my warmest thanks, Your Highness.
TEXT.Spanish: Accept my warmest thanks, Your Highness.

TEXT.English: Your debt expires. I will remember your deadbeat behaviour.
TEXT.French: Votre dette arrive à son terme. Je me souviendrai de votre comportement de mauvais payeurs.
TEXT.German: Your debt expires. I will remember your deadbeat behaviour.
TEXT.Italian: Your debt expires. I will remember your deadbeat behaviour.
TEXT.Spanish: Your debt expires. I will remember your deadbeat behaviour.

TEXT.English: Forgive me for all these inconveniences, your highness.
TEXT.French: Pardonnez-moi pour tous ces désagréments, votre Altesse.
TEXT.German: Forgive me for all these inconveniences, your highness.
TEXT.Italian: Forgive me for all these inconveniences, your highness.
TEXT.Spanish: Forgive me for all these inconveniences, your highness.

TEXT.English: You majesty, I wish to talk finance.
TEXT.French: Votre Majesté, je souhaiterais parler finance.
TEXT.German: You majesty, I wish to talk finance.
TEXT.Italian: You majesty, I wish to talk finance.
TEXT.Spanish: You majesty, I wish to talk finance.

TEXT.English: What do you want ?
TEXT.French: Que désirez-vous ?
TEXT.German: What do you want ?
TEXT.Italian: What do you want ?
TEXT.Spanish: What do you want ?

TEXT.English: I would like to pay off my debt, your Majesty.
TEXT.French: Je souhaite pouvoir rembourser ma dette, votre Majesté.
TEXT.German: I would like to pay off my debt, your Majesty.
TEXT.Italian: I would like to pay off my debt, your Majesty.
TEXT.Spanish: I would like to pay off my debt, your Majesty.

TEXT.English: Vice-Roy, I must remind you that if you pay off your debt, you will save 15% of your loan.
TEXT.French: Vice-Roi, je vous rappelle qu'en remboursant votre dette, vous économisez 15% de la somme due.
TEXT.German: Vice-Roy, I must remind you that if you pay off your debt, you will save 15% of your loan.
TEXT.Italian: Vice-Roy, I must remind you that if you pay off your debt, you will save 15% of your loan.
TEXT.Spanish: Vice-Roy, I must remind you that if you pay off your debt, you will save 15% of your loan.

TEXT.English: My finance counselor tells me your debt amounts to %d1_loan [ICON_GOLD]. The interest rate is %d2_taux%.
TEXT.French: Mes conseillers au Trésor m'informe que votre dette s'élève à %d1_loan [ICON_GOLD] avec un taux de %d2_taux%.
TEXT.German: My finance counselor tells me your debt amounts to %d1_loan [ICON_GOLD]. The interest rate is %d2_taux%.
TEXT.Italian: My finance counselor tells me your debt amounts to %d1_loan [ICON_GOLD]. The interest rate is %d2_taux%.
TEXT.Spanish: My finance counselor tells me your debt amounts to %d1_loan [ICON_GOLD]. The interest rate is %d2_taux%.

TEXT.English: Sire, I would like some information regarding my debt.
TEXT.French: Sire, je souhaite avoir des informations sur la dette que je dois rembourser.
TEXT.German: Sire, I would like some information regarding my debt.
TEXT.Italian: Sire, I would like some information regarding my debt.
TEXT.Spanish: Sire, I would like some information regarding my debt.

TEXT.English: I appreciate it, when one pays off his debt, Vice-Roy! Yours is now History. You may leave now !
TEXT.French: J'apprécie les hommes qui payent leurs dettes, vice-Roi ! La vôtre n'est plus que de l'histoire ancienne. Vous pouvez maintenant vous retirer !
TEXT.German: I appreciate it, when one pays off his debt, Vice-Roy! Yours is now History. You may leave now !
TEXT.Italian: I appreciate it, when one pays off his debt, Vice-Roy! Yours is now History. You may leave now !
TEXT.Spanish: I appreciate it, when one pays off his debt, Vice-Roy! Yours is now History. You may leave now !

TEXT.English: Whatever the price, the king intends to accept your legitimate request.
TEXT.French: Qu'importe le prix, le roi entend accepter votre légitime demande.
TEXT.German: Whatever the price, the king intends to accept your legitimate request.
TEXT.Italian: Whatever the price, the king intends to accept your legitimate request.
TEXT.Spanish: Whatever the price, the king intends to accept your legitimate request.

TEXT.English: [SPACE]We specialize in the [BOLD]%s1_yield[\BOLD] resource.
TEXT.French: [SPACE]Nous nous sommes spécialisé dans la ressource [BOLD]%s1_yield[\BOLD].
TEXT.German: [SPACE]We specialize in the [BOLD]%s1_yield[\BOLD] resource.
TEXT.Italian: [SPACE]We specialize in the [BOLD]%s1_yield[\BOLD] resource.
TEXT.Spanish: [SPACE]We specialize in the [BOLD]%s1_yield[\BOLD] resource.

TEXT.English: We would like to talk a bit...
TEXT.French: Nous aimerions discuter un peu...
TEXT.German: We would like to talk a bit...
TEXT.Italian: We would like to talk a bit...
TEXT.Spanish: We would like to talk a bit...

TEXT.English: Welcome to my palace, stranger. I am [OUR_NAME] of the mighty [OUR_CIV_ADJ] Empire. Let us discuss the movements of the stars under the enjoyment of some maize bread.
TEXT.French: Bonjour. Je suis [OUR_NAME], chef et protecteur des [OUR_CIV_ADJ:3]. Je vous considère comme mon ami. Il va de votre intérêt que je ne change jamais d'opinion.
TEXT.German: Ich kenne Euch nicht, und ich bin mir auch nicht sicher, ob ich Euch kennenlernen möchte. Ich bin [OUR_NAME], Herrscher der [OUR_CIV_ADJ:2]. Der Ruhm meines Volkes ist mittlerweile nur noch eine Legende. Fremde Krieger haben unsere Städte zerstört, unsere Kinder gestohlen und unsere Töchter geschändet. Fremde Krieger wie Ihr einer seid.
TEXT.Italian: Salve. Mi chiamo [OUR_NAME], capo e protettore del popolo [OUR_CIV_ADJ]. Ti considero un amico. è nel tuo migliore interesse che io non cambi mai idea.
TEXT.Spanish: Hola. Soy [OUR_NAME], jefe y protector del pueblo [OUR_CIV_ADJ:1]. Os considero mis amigos. Y más os vale que nunca cambie de opinión.

TEXT.English: I don't have time to waste on uncouth criminals, [CT_NAME]. Go back to where you belong.
TEXT.French: Ecoutez, je suis très occupé. Pourquoi n'iriez-vous pas faire quelques pâtés de sable ?
TEXT.German: Ich bin sehr beschäftigt. Kommt ein anderes Mal wieder.
TEXT.Italian: Senti, sono molto occupato. Perché non prendi i bambini e te ne torni al circolo?
TEXT.Spanish: Mirad, estoy muy ocupado. ¿Por qué no os lleváis a los niños y os volvéis al club?

TEXT.English: May the gods strike me with lightning the day I make peace with you, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.French: La paix ? Il ne pourra y avoir de paix que lorsque vous vous serez rendu !
TEXT.German: Frieden? Ihr kommt mit offenen Händen, doch Ihr habt Schweiß auf der Stirn. Ich traue Euch nicht.
TEXT.Italian: Pace? Ci sarà la pace quando ti arrenderai!
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Paz? ¡La tendremos cuando os rindáis!

TEXT.English: If it isn't my good friend [CT_NAME]! What brought you to the mighty [OUR_CIV_ADJ] Empire?
TEXT.French: C'est bon de parler à quelqu'un qui comprend l'importance de l'action. Voyons comment nous pourrions renforcer nos colonies.
TEXT.German: Betretet meinen Palast und lasst Euch erfrischen.
TEXT.Italian: è bello parlare con una persona che capisce l'importanza dell'azione. Parliamo di come possiamo rafforzare le nostre colonie.
TEXT.Spanish: Es bueno hablar con alguien que entiende la importancia de los actos. Charlemos sobre cómo podemos fortalecer nuestras colonias.

TEXT.English: Alright, get on with it. How do you intend to offend the gods today, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.French: C'est bon de parler à quelqu'un qui comprend l'importance de l'action. Voyons comment nous pourrions renforcer nos colonies.
TEXT.German: Ich kenne Euresgleichen. Eure liebreizenden Worte betören. Doch in Euren Augen glitzern Bosheit und Gier.
TEXT.Italian: è bello parlare con una persona che capisce l'importanza dell'azione. Parliamo di come possiamo rafforzare le nostre colonie.
TEXT.Spanish: Es bueno hablar con alguien que entiende la importancia de los actos. Charlemos sobre cómo podemos fortalecer nuestras colonias.

TEXT.English: The [OUR_EMPIRE] are in dire need, please help us.
TEXT.French: L'[OUR_EMPIRE] est en grand désarroi. Je vous en prie, aidez-nous.
